snippet.title: MADiSON — Release Date Reveal
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1670870/MADiSON

MADiSON is coming out on the 24th June 2022 on PlayStation 4, Next-Gen Consoles and PC. Nintendo Switch version will be released a little later in the Summer 2022.

What would you do if you woke up locked in a dark room, with your hands covered in blood? Play as Luca, and endure the brute torture of MADiSON, a demon that has forced him to continue a gory ritual started decades ago, making him commit abominable acts. Will you be able to finish this sinister ceremony?

Feel free to join us!
https://discord.gg/WNsZg8VPxN
https://twitter.com/madison_game
https://facebook.com/madisonvideogame
https://instagram.com/madisonvideogame/
https://madisongame.com/

Developed by BLOODIOUS GAMES LLC. Published by BLOODIOUS GAMES and Perp Games.
